Your 7-Day Free Trial

freeDes: Explore all premium features and unlock the full experience. Enjoy!
confirmReview: I confirm that my report follows the guidelines and does not contain personally identifiable details.
A1: AlertHer is a safety-focused app that lets women anonymously report experiences connected to phone numbers â€” helping others stay informed before responding, meeting, or making decisions.
Q2: Do I need to create an account or share my personal details?
A2: No. AlertHer does not ask for your name, email address, or personal information. You can search and submit reports completely anonymously.
Q3: Can anyone see the phone numbers I report?
A3: No. Phone numbers are only shown when searched directly. There is no public list of reported numbers.
Q4: What kind of reports can I submit?
A4:
You can submit experiences related to:
Missed appointments or time wasters
Unsafe or suspicious behavior
Unverified or misleading listings
Interactions that made you feel unsafe
Each report is tagged with a color-coded label, and youâ€™re encouraged to leave a short, helpful description (without using names or personal info).
Q5: Is my report linked to me?
A5: No. Your report is not linked to your name, contact details, or device ID. Reports are stored securely and reviewed for safety and accuracy.
Q6: What is not allowed in reports?
A6:
To protect all users:
No full names, addresses, or personal details
No hate speech, threats, or defamatory content
No speculation or false claims
All reports are reviewed before being published.
Q7: How can I view a report on a phone number?
A7: To view reports, you need to have an active subscription. However, new users get a 7-day free trial to access all the main features, including viewing reports.
Q8: Can I add a report for a phone number?
A8: Yes, you can add one report per day for any phone number. This feature is included in the subscription plan, or you can use it during the 7-day free trial.
Q9: How does the free trial work?
A9: When you sign up, you get a 7-day free trial to explore the main features of AlertHer, including viewing and adding reports. After the trial, you can purchase a subscription to continue using these features.
A10: We offer a variety of subscription plans to suit your needs. You can check the pricing details in the app's "Subscription Plans" section.
Q11: How do I report the report or user?
A11: You can report any inappropriate reports or user through the "Review" option available next to each report. Our team will review the report and take appropriate action.
Q12: Is there a limit to adding reports?
A12: Yes, each user can add only one report per day for a specific phone number.
Q13: What happens to these reports or users are reviewed?
A13: These reports and users account are reviewed by our moderation team. If a report or user is found to violate our guidelines, necessary actions will be taken.
A14: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time through the app's subscription settings. Note that access to main features will end when your subscription period expires.
Q15: What happens if I donâ€™t purchase a subscription after the free trial?
A15: If you donâ€™t subscribe after the trial, you will lose access to the main features, including viewing and adding reviews. However, you can still browse limited features of the app.
Q16: Does AlertHer sell or share my data?
A16: Absolutely not. We do not share, sell, or rent user data. AlertHer is privacy-first â€” always.
